feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.10.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix some issues with new automation step panel by @PClmnt in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16114

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.10.4...3.10.5

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.10.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Initial code for an experimental Budibase AI agent feature. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16081
  • Type client screen store by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16105
  • Proxy the 'refresh all data providers' action across screen peek modals by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16095
  • Rename Prompt to LLMRequest by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16115
  • Make date-only fields a bit more clever in accepting input dates. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16118
  • Simplify Redis initialisation logic, instrument with DataDog by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16120
  • Don't disconnect on error. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16130

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.10.5...3.10.6

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.10.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Flag off the agent sidebar. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16131
  • Make pod termination grace period configurable. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16134
  • New automation error state: timed_out. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16141
  • Update to node 22 by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/15038
  • Update node image usage to 22 by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16146
  • Fix query parameter binding when passing a 0, it shouldn't fall back to the default value. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16147
  • Design updates by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16136

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.10.6...3.10.7

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.11.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Protect against group.roles being undefined on the user details page. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16150
  • Update node usage in bb/couchdb image by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16151

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.10.7...3.11.0

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.11.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix flake in generic-sql.spec.ts. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16155
  • Fixing AI table generation by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16158

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.11.0...3.11.1
